header.title: Hey, I'm Enrique Suarez
header.description: I am a web developer with experience in creating modern and functional applications. After completing an internship at a company, I am now working as a freelance web developer, helping clients turn their ideas into effective and attractive digital projects. I am eager to continue growing professionally and collaborate with a team where I can contribute my skills and further develop my abilities

marketec_360.title: Marketec 360
marketec_360.description: Internship at a company for 3 months, responsible for creating interactive web apps using NextJS, React, and TailwindCSS with Github and Git for version control.
marketec_360.projects_title: Some of the projects in which I have participated in  Marketec360

freelancer.title: Freelancer Web Developer
freelancer.description: Freelance web developer with hands-on experience designing and building responsive, user-friendly websites and web applications. Skilled in modern technologies like Next.js, React, and Node.js, with a strong focus on delivering clean code and functional, intuitive interfaces. Proven ability to manage projects independently from concept to deployment, ensuring client satisfaction and timely delivery.

depilacion_laser.title: Depilacion Laser SHR
depilacion_laser.description: Creation of informative website for SHR laser hair removal clinic, with a contact section. Using Nextjs, Typescript and TailwindCSS

dc_wine.title: DC Wine
dc_wine.description: DC Wine is a modern eCommerce platform for a wine shop using Next.js, Tailwind CSS, Firebase for real-time database management, and Stripe for secure payment processing. The platform allows users to easily browse and purchase a variety of wines with a smooth, responsive design, providing a seamless and secure shopping experience.

sky_match.title: skyMatch
sky_match.description: SkyMatch is a web platform that connects airlines with available aircraft and crew for rental, offering a streamlined solution for covering operational gaps. It provides an intuitive interface, advanced search features, and secure bookings to ensure seamless transactions. Using Nextjs, Typescript and TailwindCSS

sky_match_api.title: skyMatch REST API
sky_match_api.description: Creation of a REST API using Nodejs, Express and MySQL for the skyMatch App

crematorio_hela.title: Crematorio Hela
crematorio_hela.description: Creation of a modern and responsive web application for a pet crematory service, built with Vite, React, Tailwind CSS, Swiper, and i18n for translations.

task_manager.title: Task Manager
task_manager.description: Creation of a full-stack task management app with drag-and-drop features, task creation/editing, and real-time state syncing. Built with Next.js + tailwindCSS (Frontend) and Node.js + MongoDB (Backend).
